localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in San Francisco

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in San Francisco
stateCompliance.content: San Francisco residents are protected by California's comprehensive consumer lending regulations. The DFPI oversees all cash advance lenders to ensure compliance.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of check amount (approximately 460% APR)
Only one loan allowed at a time - no rollovers permitted
Criminal prosecution threats are strictly prohibited
Lion Cash Advance is DFPI licensed and regulated
Maximum one $15 NSF fee per bounced check
All disclosures must be clear and in your language
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes. California cash advance regulations are strictly enforced and subject to change. For the most current information, contact the DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. Consult a California attorney for specific legal guidance.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Bay Area Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Need a location closer to you? We serve these nearby Bay Area cities:

faq.question: Where is your San Francisco location?
faq.answer: We're located at 567 Market Street, Suite 300, right across from the historic Cable Cars in the Financial District. Take US-101 or I-80 to Exit 427 toward downtown. Street parking and nearby parking garages available.

faq.question: Can I get same-day cash in San Francisco?
faq.answer: Yes! Bring your valid ID, recent pay stubs or proof of income, and checking account details. Most customers are approved and funded same day.

faq.question: What are your fees in California?
faq.answer: California caps payday loan fees at 15% of the check amount. For a $200 loan, the fee is $30. For $255, the maximum fee is $45.

faq.question: How long does the approval process take?
faq.answer: Typically 30-45 minutes from application to funding. Our Market Street location is quick and efficient.

faq.question: Are you licensed to operate in California?
faq.answer: Yes, Lion Cash Advance is fully licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation. Verify our license at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/
